staticherobanner.description: New miles earning structure effective January 1, 2018*
staticherobanner.title: Earn miles just for paying your gas bill!*

delta_signup_content.confirmationpageheader: Thank you for considering Ohio Natural Gas.
delta_signup_content.confirmationpagesubhead: Your information has been submitted successfully!
delta_signup_content.header:
It’s easy to start participating.

Simply enter your ONG account and SkyMiles member information below. If you’d prefer to enroll by phone, call ONG toll-free at 1.888.466.4427 and mention that you would like to enroll in ONG’s Delta SkyMiles program. Please have your SkyMiles account number handy when you call.
delta_signup_content.sidecontent:
Switch to Ohio Natural Gas and start earning with Delta SkyMiles®.

Ohio Natural Gas(ONG) is excited to be a Delta SkyMiles partner and the only natural gas supplier in Ohio with whom you can earn miles from Delta just for paying your natural gas bill.

HOW IT WORKS:

  • Customers will earn TWO miles for every dollar spent on their ONG supplier natural gas charges (excluding sales tax and one-time charges)!Ɨ
  • And, if you are a Delta SkyMiles® Medallion® member, Delta will award an additional mile for each dollar spent as described above!

Frequently Asked Questions >

Delta Program Terms & Conditions >
delta_signup_content.viewplansheader: Not an Ohio Natural Gas Customer?
delta_signup_content.viewplanssubhead: Not yet a customer, but want to sign up with Ohio Natural Gas to take advantage of this offer?
